import React, {useState} from "react"; import "./booking.css"; import { Form, FormGroup, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Button} from "reactstrap"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; const Booking = ({tour, avgRating}) => { const { price, reviews } = tour; const navigate = u const [credentials, setCredentials] = useState ({ userId: '01', userEmail:'priyank454@gmail.com', fullName:'', phone:'', guestSize:1, bookAt:'' }) const handleChange = e => { setCredentials(prev=> ({...prev, [e.target.id]:e.target.value})) }; const serviceFee = 10 const totalAmount = Number(price) * Number(credentials.guestSize) + Number (serviceFee) const handleClick = e => { e.preventDefault(); }; return (

${price} /per person

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} ({reviews ?.length})
Information
${price} 1 person
${price}
Service charge
${serviceFee}
Total
${totalAmount}
); }; export default Booking;
